address: 49 E 12th St APT 1D, New York, NY 10003
description:
For sale: $1,650,000. Beautiful and unique three bedroom duplex in the Village. Great attention to detail was given to the gut renovation of this home in 2017 which provides a high-end, modern feel combined with classic, pre-war accents. The 14' ceilings in the main living space are complimented by crown moldings, exposed brick, a cast-iron column and tasteful lighting. The immaculate kitchen includes a Sub Zero refrigerator/freezer, a Miele dishwasher and a Big Chill range with a vented hood. All the fixtures are matched to the custom cabinetry and hardware which include built-ins for pantry and an appliance garage to help keep everything out of sight when not needed. Custom closets and in-wall sound insulation in the master bedroom are just some of the behind-the-scenes touches that add to the quality of this living space. The apartment is also wired for ethernet and surround audio throughout. 

The flexible layout of this apartment allows for a variety of living options. Currently used as a bedroom on the main floor, a second bedroom downstairs and an office/workshop, one could easily move the master bedroom to the lower level and even create a full master suite downstairs. Or use the upstairs room as a den or other living space while maintaining two bedrooms down below. The walk-in closet is large enough to accommodate a desk or other storage and the downstairs bath includes dual sinks and a steam shower. 

Set apart from the rest of the building, this apartment feels like an oasis from the rigors of city life. It is pin-drop quiet and boasts the building's only entrance to a pleasant brick courtyard. Enjoy a fantastically convenient and coveted location just 2 blocks from Union Square and all the shopping, restaurants, entertainment and transportation options there including the 4, 5, 6, N, R, Q, W, and L trains. 

Additional amenities of the building include a shared rooftop terrace, discounted cable and internet, and a live-in super who receives deliveries for residents. The building is currently in process of replacing all windows and will be renovating the lobby-- all of which is already funded. This downtown coop allows pets, pied-a-terres, gifts, co-purchasing, guarantors, and subletting after two years or residency.

For sale: $21,500,000. 65 Irving Place is an unsurpassed townhouse commanding coveted corner placement on one of the most historic and charming blocks in Gramercy, with a flawless turnkey full gut renovation just recently completed. 

Rarely does a property of this exquisite calibre come to market. A pinnacle showpiece home, presenting a rarified triple coup of beauty, opportunity, and tremendous value. 

Built in 1846, the expansive 5 floors of living space are imbued with classic clean lines and elegant symmetry. The meticulous renovation and redesign of 65 Irving Place attends to every imaginable detail with precision. This home is at once fresh, modern, classic and timeless. 

Inclusive of all new state-of-the-art systems the quality of finish throughout is seamless, absolute, authentically sourced & expertly wrought by master craftsmen. Grand entertaining spaces, gracious living quarters & full floor bedroom suites, all bathed in sunlight via large custom windows & rare triple S/E/W exposures. Superb imported Hungarian reclaimed oak flooring throughout. The chic kitchen and baths are exquisite, custom designed and flawlessly executed. Master bath is complete with separate sauna and steam shower. 

Kitchen cabinetry is custom Boffi, appliances are Gaggenau. Three generous decks provide flowing & private outdoor space, a 6th floor glass pergola gives entry to the full roof deck. Superlative quality, beauty & intelligent design, resulting in a beguiling & captivatingly superb property. 

This property is further enhanced by 2 separate entrances & opportunity in terms of c/o allowed uses. The scope, proportion, triple exposure & flexibility of space grant a unique & valuable ease of modification to satisfy a vast variety of choices. A rare & beautiful achievement, perfectly executed.

For sale: $4,950,000. Incredible opportunity to custom design a 20'-wide, four-story, Anglo-Italianate brick townhouse located on a tree-lined block in the heart of the East Village. Uniquely situated beside a landmarked synagogue, 321 East 6th Street faces south and offers THREE exposures and over 30 windows, providing brilliant sunlight and the ability to create the floor plan of your dreams.



Once the home to filmmaker Paul Morrissey and artist Andy Warhol, this historic residence retains many original details including wood-burning fireplaces, crown moldings, parquet and hardwood floors and soaring ceilings. There is a distinct high stoop parlor entry as well as a separate garden level entry leading to a landscaped backyard with a pond and flagstone patio. The entire property offers nearly 6000 square feet and approximately 2,300 square feet of developable rights. 



Delivered vacant and priced to sell, this is truly a rare opportunity to create your masterpiece.

description:
For sale: $2,350,000. Modern and beautifully renovated penthouse duplex with a private rooftop, located in the heart of Gramercy Park. This meticulously redesigned 2 bedroom, 2 bathroom townhouse co-op has been featured in Architectural Digest, and is an urban oasis that offers a sense of peace and tranquility so hard to find in New York City.

Spacious, light and airy, the great room is accentuated by three picture windows overlooking townhouse gardens, and a custom designed wood burning fireplace by WMH Jackson. Bespoke built-ins maximize storage while maintaining the modern and functional design aesthetic of this home. The dining room easily seats 10 and is adjacent to the open and windowed chefs kitchen. Outfitted in custom cabinets, kitchen appliances include Miele & Sub Zero, and a marble waterfall island with seating for 4 completes the layout. 

The traditional staircase is anchored by a custom Stephen Antonson 22-foot chandelier and draws attention to the sky lit second floor. The large master bedroom suite has a custom walk-in closet and a luxurious master bath outfitted in Ann Sacks, Walker Zanger and Rohl finishes with a double vanity, stall shower and a large Waterworks soaking tub. The bright second bedroom has sleek custom shelving, a custom closet and adjacent full bathroom. 

Featuring a gas-line professional grill, custom finished decking, a seating and dining area, the landscaped private roof deck is perfect for entertaining. French windows provide endless natural light throughout the entire home.

A full size LG washer/dryer, hardwood floors, custom lighting, smart & streamlined storage, Baldwin & Delta hardware, and four skylights offer complete functionality and comfort within the home. 

137 East 15th St. is a boutique townhouse co-op in the heart of Gramercy Park with recently renovated hallways and vestibule. Located near the multiple transit and shopping hubs of Union Square and Flatiron, the building is pet friendly and comes with a storage unit in the basement.

The fully renovated bathroom has classic tiles and fixtures. Large and fitted closets throughout and a flexible floor plan make this a must see home.



The Brevoort East is one of the most sought after full service buildings in the heart of Greenwich Village, known for its hotel like services. It is close to every major subway line, crosstown buses, Whole Foods, Trader Joes, Gristedes and all of the best in fine dining and shopping. The building offers a 24 hour doorman, concierge, state of the art brand new gym, playroom, bike room, storage, refrigerator/freezer storage for grocery deliveries, live in super, on-site building parking, on-site managing agent, grand lobby, an amazing roof deck with WiFi.
